name: xkcd-forum-linker
title: XKCD Forum Linker
description: Provide ways to get to the discussion forum page for individual xkcd comics. Can either add a link to the page on load or redirect to the forum page when a button is clicked.
author: djh

preferences.name: addLinkOnLoad
preferences.title: Add Link On Page Load
preferences.description: Automatically add a hyperlink to the forum page for the current comic on page load. Otherwise you gotta click the button.

preferences.name: debug
preferences.title: Log Debug Messages
preferences.description: Log messages to the console to help debug what is happening
